TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 包含行标头单元格和列标头单元格常用的功能。

span.span: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是其他标头单元格类（如 和 ）的基类。This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as and . 若要创建自定义行标题图标或列标题标志符号，请从 类继承并添加功能以绘制您自己的图标或字形。To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取标头单元格类似按钮的可视状态。

span.span: Gets the buttonlike visual state of the header cell.
One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与按钮类似，可以单击它来设置状态，如排序或执行行级别选择。A is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection. 属性使用 值来提供类似按钮的可视状态。The property uses values to provide buttonlike visual states.

summary.span: 创建此单元的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当从 派生并将新属性添加到派生类时，重写 方法。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关启用视觉样式的信息，请参阅 方法。For information about enabling visual styles, see the method. 在 之前调用。 is called just before . 如果对 的调用具有取消 `rowIndex`行共享的效果，则该方法必须返回 `true`。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`. 否则应返回 `false`。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

related.span: 缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该单元格是一个行标头单元格，则在其行可见并且 `true` 属性时，它将可见。If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格为列标头单元格，则在其列可见且 `true` 属性时可见。If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格是左上方标题单元格，并且 和 均为 true，则可见。If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both and are true.
